plot: A famous writer is murdered in the hallway of his apartment building. His widows plans to publish his last works. Major Kamenskaya investigates the case and asks for the writing analysis of late author's works.
title: Kamenskaya: Chuzhaya maska
plot_es: A famous writer is murdered in the hallway of his apartment building. His widows plans to publish his last works. Major Kamenskaya investigates the case and asks for the writing analysis of late author's works.
plot_en: A famous writer is murdered in the hallway of his apartment building. His widows plans to publish his last works. Major Kamenskaya investigates the case and asks for the writing analysis of late author's works.
